`restrictions.restriction.description`|`restrictionText` + “-” + `restrictionValue` + “-” + `restrictionType` + “-” + `description`| # Aircraft Weight & Balance Data Model ### Data Retrieval > Modified Aircraft Weight & Balance data is published by SXS Internal Systems to the EventHub topic: `com.riverx.topic.in.flight.aircraftweightbalance.source` {.is-info} #### - Data Retrieval Scope * Retrieve newly published events from the relevant EventHub topic #### - Source Event Broker Topic * `weightbalance`: `com.riverx.topic.in.flight.aircraftweightbalance.source` #### - Data Retrieval Trigger & Steps **Trigger:** Each new event published to the topic **Steps:** Retrieve events #### - Change Data Capture Operation * Unique Key: A composite key combining `regId` and `type` (see Mapping for details) * Insert and update operations are carried out using Unique Key. * No delete operation is performed, as the source system does not delete Aircraft Weight & Balance records. ### Mapping |Model Attribute|Source Topic|Source Field|Detail| |:----|:----|:----|:----| |extraInfo| | | | |regId|`weightbalance`|`aircraft`| | |recordWorkOrderId|`weightbalance`|`workorder`| | |recordDate|`weightbalance`|`date`| | |recordType|`weightbalance`|`type`| | |registerarId|`weightbalance`|`issuedBy`| | |description|`weightbalance`|`description`| | |documentNumber|`weightbalance`|`document`| | |type| | |

  • The field is set to one of the following value:

    • “Basic Data”

    • “Operational Data ”

    • “Reported Changes&r
